name: ELIXX
description:
control your ball type of character downwards avoiding spikes to cover up distance so you can win each level.

Note the timer also because if you make no movement within 5 seconds, the game will be all over.

Each level gets more difficult as there are more distance to cover.

*Simple survival game

*Simple graphics

*+5 unlockable characters

*Beautiful character skins

What are you waiting for?❤️❤️❤️👇👇👇
